body:
@PetSerAl I can repro this with just `cmd.exe` so I don't think this is a PowerShell issue. It is probably by design in Windows. I don't like the behavior either.

```batch
C:\WINDOWS\system32>mkdir test

C:\Windows\System32>cd test

C:\Windows\System32\test>copy ..\notepad.exe cmd.exe
        1 file(s) copied.

C:\Windows\System32\test>dir
 Volume in drive C has no label.
 Volume Serial Number is BA92-0884

 Directory of C:\Windows\System32\test

08/22/2018  08:12 PM    <DIR>          .
08/22/2018  08:12 PM    <DIR>          ..
04/11/2018  07:34 PM           245,760 cmd.exe
               1 File(s)        245,760 bytes
               2 Dir(s)  23,496,794,112 bytes free

C:\Windows\System32\test>start ..\cmd.exe
```
